title: Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1930
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"/See #7879; lower left: 8; lower right in red color pencil: P
description: Plan and elevation drawing for shelving unit . L-shaped metal base and side support at left, three glass shelves with rounded right edge connected to metal support; tubular metal piece at right connecting shelves. Decorative sculptural figure on glass pedestal atop tubular metal piece.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-880.
